data.title: Daniella Pombo on LinkedIn: #ibmquantum #quantumcomputing
data.meta_description:
What an honor and privilege it was to be apart of the very first IBM Quantum Summit LATAM held at the IBM Think Lab Sao Paulo, Brazil! 

Thank you to all those…
data.text:
I had the privilege to attend the MxD Quantum Technology Summit - to engage with and learn from manufacturers interested in jumping into quantum computing. At the Summit, Governor J.B. Pritzker and Senator Dick Durbin shared their commitment for and the importance in developing Chicago as a global quantum hub through investment. It is a very exciting time to be a Chicagoan! Thank you to all the organizers at MxD for an amazing event and to all the IBMers Matt Nicholls Charles Chung Paul Parazzoli Ruchi Pendse Duane Martin who spoke and attended the event! Check out the opening remarks and Governor J.B Pritzkers speech here: https://lnkd.in/g3q8xkWs #quantumcomputing #IBMQuantum #manufacturing #advancedmanufacturing #chicagoquantum #chicagotech #MxDQuantumTechnologySummit

Este año tuve la gran fortuna de trabajar con Andrea Romero Santiago I. Sordo Palacios Aida Kajs Emilio Balderas Lucas Rebers para crear y formalizar un espacio oficial para apoyar a estudiantes Latinos y celebrar las bellas culturas y idiomas que existen en América Latina. Nuestro trabajo culminó en la creación de Chicago Booth Association of Latin American Students (ALAS) #Booth, el primer club de este tipo en el programa Part Time en Booth! Estoy muy agradecida de haber participado en este camino. Fue un honor y privilegio ser parte de una escuela, grupo de Boothies y amigos que apoyan y celebran la diversidad de nuestro estudiantes! —- This year I had the great fortune to work along side Andrea Romero Santiago I. Sordo Palacios Emilio Balderas Aida Kajs and Lucas Rebers to create and formalize an official space to support Latino students and celebrate the beautiful cultures and languages within Latin America. Our work culminated in the creation of Chicago Booth Association of Latin American Students (ALAS) #Booth, the first club of its kind within the Part Time program. I am very fortunate and grateful to be a part of this journey! It was an honor and privilege to be part of #Booth, peers, and friends that celebrate the diversity of our students! #ChicagoBooth #Latinos #LatinosinMBA
